text:
Windows Extended Protection will be enabled by default with the upcoming
Cumulative Update for Exchange Server 2019: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/plan-and-deploy/post-installation-tasks/security-best-practices/exchange-extended-protection?view=exchserver-2019
 
What this entails: 
https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/exchange-team-blog/coming-soon-enabling-extended-protection-on-exchange-server-by/ba-p/3911849
 
^^^ 
The comments are a good read on what to prepare for. 
Then, take the time to read up on the dos and don’ts of extended protection
here: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/plan-and-deploy/post-installation-tasks/security-best-practices/exchange-extended-protection?view=exchserver-2019#prerequisites-for-enabling-extended-protection-on-exchange-server
 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:  
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday. 
--
%40MPECSInc.Ca

metadata.topic: Upcoming Exchange 2019 CU - Windows Extended Protection will be enabled by Default
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Upcoming Exchange 2019 CU - Windows Extended Protection will be enabled by Default
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from philipelder@mpecsinc.ca. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Windows Extended Protection will be enabled by default with the upcoming
Cumulative Update for Exchange Server 2019: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/plan-and-deploy/post-installation-tasks/security-best-practices/exchange-extended-protection?view=exchserver-2019

What this entails:

[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fexchange-team-blog%2Fcoming-soon-enabling-extended-protection-on-exchange-server-by%2Fba-p%2F3911849&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1e1f029ed2b64df3121108dc188619d7%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638412211449370239%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=LaFBYQZW70EqimRIcjZ29%2FkN1mQCRLmZukk3%2BK1eV78%3D&reserved=0]
